name: A Box of Things
description:
A Box of Things is a minimalist and relaxing game about letting go of keepsakes.

This game was created for the 2021 Global game jam

Credits:

Jacob Leaney - Programming and music

Sarah Pavlich - Art

Brian Burns - Programming

Andrew Ryan - Bin SFX

Sketchfab Assets by:

Anthony Yanez, SEED.EA, Pixel and Offy.
